sentences.en: A large percentage of the population is illiterate.
sentences.cn: 文盲人口占有相当高的比例。

sentences.en: A small but significant number of 11-year-olds are illiterate.
sentences.cn: 数量不多但仍有相当一部分11岁孩子是文盲。

sentences.en: Being illiterate, he had to learn the stories by heart.
sentences.cn: 由于不识字, 这些故事他都得背下来.

sentences.en: But she was illiterate herself. Why was she so anxious for me to study?
sentences.cn: 妈是不识字的, 为什么这样催我念书 呢 ?

sentences.en: He had been to school but he had learnt nothing there, so he was now illiterate.
sentences.cn: 他上过学但什么也没学到, 因此现在还是个文盲.

sentences.en: Her powers had received no aid from education: she was ignorant and illiterate.
sentences.cn: 她的才能没能得到教育的帮助,她蒙昧无知.

sentences.en: It was an illiterate letter, full of mistakes.
sentences.cn: 这封信文笔拙劣，错误连篇。

sentences.en: Many senior managers are technologically illiterate.
sentences.cn: 许多高级经理都对技术知之甚少。

sentences.en: Natty , brave, kindly, and illiterate hovers between the two worlds of Indian and white man.
sentences.cn: 勇敢 、 善良 、 目不识丁的纳蒂, 徘徊于印第安人与白人世界之间.

sentences.en: Now I am twenty - eight and am in reality more illiterate than many schoolboys of fifteen.
sentences.cn: 现在我已二十八岁,但在现实生活中,比许多十五岁的学童更无知.

sentences.en: Only ten percent of the population here is illiterate.
sentences.cn: 这里只有百分之十的居民是文盲.

sentences.en: Over ninety percent of the islanders here are illiterate.
sentences.cn: 这儿的岛民,百分之九十以上都是文盲.

sentences.en: There 50 percent or more of the population is illiterate.
sentences.cn: 那里50%或更多的群众是文盲.

sentences.en: There are still many illiterate people in our country.
This report was semi - illiterate but crammed with facts.
sentences.cn: 尽管这份报告写得半文 半 白,不过证据充分.

sentences.en: When he was at school he had learnt nothing, so he was now illiterate.
sentences.cn: 他上学的时候什么也没学到, 因此现在他还是个文盲.

trans.tran_en: not knowing how to read or write
someone who has not learned to read or write
someone who has not learned to read or write
